WRITING.TEXT: Hell yea man That's sounding great now Those instruments are a huge improvement! It sounds much more unique and it has its own character now Nice job!
No problem man! Thanks for the help with the mix on mine I can tell you've got a mind for this, and if you ever need someone to collab with I'm totally down

This isn't normally the type of beat that I'm into, but I like the groove of it. I think that the actual arrangement is pretty good but I think you could pick some better sounds. They just sound out of place with the one good high synth sound. I would say just play around with sounds and find some that fit together better
Thank you! I definitely agree that it needs more, I'll play around with some synths! Sorry, but what do you mean about the high hat? I don't know much about mixing

Dude! This is dope shit If I could say anything I would say it may need to be a touch faster but that's just me I love the creepy vibes it's got all over it As a rapper there is so much room to play around with flows on this track and it makes me happy I wanna hear someone go hard on this!

WRITING.TITLE: Need advice urgently! Please help
WRITING.TEXT: My friend got kicked out of his place about a month ago and he moved into my place without really asking me. I just happened to be at his house when he got kicked out. He quit his job the very next day and isn't trying to find a new one. I can barely afford to live by myself and my anxiety makes my life difficult enough without him being here. I have been a wreck, as I am a creature of habit and rituals (OCD), and they have all been disturbed. I need to tell him to leave but I can't muster up the courage to talk to him about it. I don't know what to do...

Hahaha you just proved me right. You keep denying that YOU are in control of your life. You will be unhappy and alone until the day you die, and it won't be anybody's fault but your own. I would tell you to kill yourself if you felt that strongly about this, but you'd probably say "even if I killed myself no one would care" or some other pathetic bullshit. So, all I will say is I hope you get out of the slump you're in. I hope you find someone who cares for you. I really hope you can find something in life to cling to, because it's not all about sex and girls.
